label: 大久保利通
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: おおくぼ としみち
説明文: (1830-78). Also: Ichizo. Satsuma hirazamurai. Loyalist and domain bureaucrat; with Saigo Takamori, largely controlled domain policies after 1864. After Restoration, key figure in Meiji government; councillor (Sanyo; Sangi); minister. Dominant figure after Korea dispute of 1873 until assassinated, 1878.
